articles.author: Mark Ogden
articles.title: How Luton Town FC inched closer to Premier League status - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Luton Town have never been in the Premier League -- they were relegated right before the first season -- but they're 90 minutes from glory. It would mark a stunning, decade-long ride from the nonleagues to the top flight.
articles.content:
After a slow start to the season, Luton Town have been superb in 2023 and their form vaulted them to within 90 minutes of joining the Premier League. Andrew Kearns - CameraSport via Getty Images
